titles.title: 696 If God Be For Us (easy excellent)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Rejoice in the Lord
Oh let His mercy cheer
He sunders the bands that enthrall
Redeemed by His blood
Why should we ever fear
Since Jesus is our all in all

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
If God be for us
If God be for us
If God be for us
Who can be against us
Who - Who - Who
Who can be against us
Against us

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Be strong in the Lord
Rejoicing in His might
Be loyal and true day by day
When evils assail
Be valiant for the right
And He will be our strength
And stay

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Confide in His Word
His promises so sure
In Christ they are
Yea and amen
Though earth pass away
They ever shall endure
'Tis written o'er and o'er again

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Abide in the Lord
Secure in His control
'Tis life everlasting begun
To pluck from His hand
The weakest trembling soul
It never never can be done
